content: "Have you ever noticed," asked Anne reflectively, "that when people say it is their duty to tell you a certain thing you may prepare for something disagreeable? Why is it that they never seem to think it a duty to tell you the pleasant things they hear about you?"
translations: ita:Hai mai notato, chiese Anna riflettendo, che quando la gente dice di doverti dire certe cose ti devi preparare a sentire
